content.text:
# A. B. M. Anowarul Haque

ABM Anowarul Haque is a Bangladesh Awami League politician and a former member of parliament for Manikganj-1.
Career
Anowarul Haque was elected to parliament from Manikganj-1, a constituency comprising Daulatpur, Ghior, and Shivalaya upazilas, as a Bangladesh Awami League candidate in 2008.
